LanguageData.PBTweaks.debug_mode_desc: Print debug information to log file/console.
LanguageData.PBTweaks.debug_mode_desc_0: Keeping Debug Mode on can affect performance, disable it when not needed.
LanguageData.PBTweaks.add_bonding_toggle_gizmo: Add Bonding Control gizmo to Highmates
LanguageData.PBTweaks.add_bonding_toggle_gizmo_desc: The gizmo will appear when selecting the Highmate.
LanguageData.PBTweaks.add_bonding_toggle_gizmo_desc_0: With this gizmo you can decide which Highmate is allowed to initiate automatic Bonding.
LanguageData.PBTweaks.add_bonding_toggle_gizmo_desc_1: When the gizmo is toggled ON the Highmate is free to Bond with whomever
LanguageData.PBTweaks.add_bonding_toggle_gizmo_desc_2: When the gizmo is toggled OFF the Highmate cannot Bond freely, you can choose who they Bond to by choosing the Highmate and right-clicking on another pawn, and selecting the 'Romance' option.
LanguageData.PBTweaks.prevent_colonist_bonding_with_s: Prevent colonists from Bonding with strangers
No more frolicking with strangers, which leads to unintended Bondings.
LanguageData.PBTweaks.prevent_strangers_bonding_with_: Prevent strangers from Bonding with each other
Strangers will not frolick with each other.
LanguageData.PBTweaks.psychic_bond_far_title_desc: This section controls various Psychic Bond distance checks, buffs, and debuffs.
LanguageData.PBTweaks.psychic_bond_far_title_desc_0: Far distance checks happen when the bonded pawns are on different maps.
LanguageData.PBTweaks.remove_psychic_distance_desc: If selected, bonded pawns no longer suffer any debuffs due to being on different maps.
LanguageData.PBTweaks.distance_consciousness_bonus_de: When bonded pawns are on different maps they suffer a debuff to their consciousness.
LanguageData.PBTweaks.distance_mood_bonus_desc: When bonded pawns are on different maps they suffer a debuff to their mood.
LanguageData.PBTweaks.psychic_bond_near_title_desc: This section controls various Psychic Bond close distance checks and buffs.
LanguageData.PBTweaks.psychic_bond_near_title_desc_0: Close distance checks happen when bonded pawns are on the same map.
LanguageData.PBTweaks.consciousness_bonus_desc: When bonded pawns are on the same map their consciousness gets buffed.
LanguageData.PBTweaks.mood_bonus_desc: When bonded pawns are on the same map their mood gets buffed.
LanguageData.PBTweaks.psychic_bond_torn_title_desc: This section controls various Psychic Bond Torn options.
LanguageData.PBTweaks.psychic_bond_torn_title_desc_0: The Bond Torn effects apply when the bonded pawns lose their connection (i.e. when death occurs).
LanguageData.PBTweaks.bond_torn_mood_effect_desc: When the Bond is Torn the pawn will suffer decreased mood for 30 days.
LanguageData.PBTweaks.tear_bond_title_desc: Yes, now you can officially Tear those Bonds!
LanguageData.PBTweaks.tear_bond_title_desc_0: Tearing the Bond will cause the bonded pawn to forget their romantic relationship with the Highmate.
LanguageData.PBTweaks.add_tear_bond_gizmo: Add [Tear Bond!] Gizmo to bonded Highmates
LanguageData.PBTweaks.add_tear_bond_gizmo_desc: The gizmo will appear when selecting the Highmate.
LanguageData.PBTweaks.add_tear_bond_context_menu: Add [Tear Bond!] to context menu options
LanguageData.PBTweaks.add_tear_bond_context_menu_desc: The option will appear when selecting the Highmate and right-clicking on them.
LanguageData.PBTweaks.disable_tear_bond_consequences_: By enabling this option, there will be no consequences for manually tearing the Bond.
LanguageData.PBTweaks.tear_bond_consequences_minimum_: While tearing the Bond manually, there is a chance that the Highmate will enter into a Mental Break state.
LanguageData.PBTweaks.tear_bond_days_for_consequences: Based on the duration of the Bond, the Highmate will suffer varying degrees of consequences and debuffs.
Consequences for tearing the Bond after [:param_days_duration] :param_bond_day_days and [:params_bond_hours_duration] :param_bond_hour_hours:
